# The posix extension

This extension provides support for POSIX-like functions.

> [!NOTE]
> This extension is available only on \*nix systems.

## Configuration options

### PHP_EXT_POSIX

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enables the extension.

### PHP_EXT_POSIX_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Builds extension as shared.
